seo.title: Seedance 2.0 - Akıllı Yapay Zeka Video Oluşturma Platformu | Seedance Türkçe Sürümü
seo.description: Seedance 2.0, sinematik kalitede içerik oluşturma için metin, görüntü, ses ve video girişlerini destekleyen son teknoloji bir AI video üretim modelidir.

hero.title: Yönetmen Seviyesinde Kontrol
hero.subtitle: Birleşik çok modlu üretim mimarisi. Metin, görüntü ve sesten, benzeri görülmemiş kontrol ve gerçekçilikle sinematik videolar oluşturun.

text_to_video.title: Text to Video AI
text_to_video.desc: Describe scenes, characters and camera moves in natural language and let our Text to Video AI turn them into coherent multi-shot videos.

image_to_video.title: Image to Video AI
image_to_video.desc: Upload a single reference photo and watch it become a short AI-generated video. Preserve identity and style with high fidelity.

text_to_image.title: Text to Image AI
text_to_image.desc: Turn text prompts into high-resolution images. Describe style, lighting and composition once, then generate multiple variations.

ai_tools.title: AI Video Effects & Tools
ai_tools.desc: Upload photos, choose an AI video effect template and let our system auto-generate a short stylized clip.

features.title: Why Choose Seedance 2.0?
features.subtitle: Break the boundaries of creativity with the most comprehensive multimodal content generation capabilities.

list.title: Unified Multimodal Architecture
list.desc: Supports text, image, audio, and video inputs. Integrated editing capabilities for seamless content creation.

list.title: Director-Level Control
list.desc: Precise control over acting, lighting, and camera movement. Turn your creative vision into reality exactly as you imagined.

list.title: Hyper-Realistic Quality
list.desc: Exceptional motion stability and physical law adherence. Native audio-visual synchronization for immersive experiences.

list.title: Industrial Grade Workflow
list.desc: Tailored for advertising, film, and social media. Output quality meets industrial delivery standards.

items.title: Advertising
items.desc: Create high-converting video ads in minutes.
